results.name: Triangle T(n,k) with diagonals T(n,n-k)=binomial(n+1,2k).
comment: Row sums are A000079. Diagonal sums are A062200. Inverse is A065547, less the first column.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Aug 29 2004
